CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Date_de_debut__c >= DATE( YEAR( TODAY()),07, 01 ), Date_de_debut__c <= DATE( YEAR( TODAY()),08, 31 ), Date_de_fin__c >= DATE( YEAR( TODAY()),07, 01 ), Date_de_fin__c <= DATE( YEAR( TODAY()),08, 31), OR(RecordType.Id == $Label.RT_Conge_Indispo_Conge ,RecordType.Id == $Label.RT_Conge_Indispo_Disponibilite ) ), true, false)
CustomField.label: TECH Conges Dispo Juillet Aout
